text: Curious about Katey Sagal’s husband? Despite making her debut in the entertainment industry in the 1970s, she has managed to maintain her relevance even in the current day and age. Sagal has featured in multiple high-profile projects on the small screen, such as Married… with Children, Futurama, and Sons of Anarchy. Apart from her work, fans of the actress/singer are also eager to learn who her current husband is. So, here’s everything you need to know regarding the Golden Globe winner’s spouse, including his profession and their relationship. Who is Katey Sagal married to? Katey Sagal is married to Kurt Sutter. Following their marriage, the duo also collaborated on a professional level, working together on the critically acclaimed FX series, Sons of Anarchy. While talking about her “fantastic” experience on the show in the Literally! With Rob Lowe, Katey Sagal noted how supportive she and her husband are to each other. “He understood what it was that I could do and my frustration around not being able to really dig into something. He just stood by it and it’s kind of a testament to a good marriage,” the veteran actress stated. What is Kurt Sutter’s job? Katey Sagal’s husband is a screenwriter, director, producer, and actor. Kurt Sutter not only helmed, wrote, and executively produced The Shield but also took on the role of Margos Dezerian in the show. However, his claim to fame occurred in 2008 when he created the Charlie Hunnam-led Sons of Anarchy, where he served as the showrunner, writer, and director, all the while playing the role of Otto Delaney. Sutter famously shared screen with his wife on the series, with the latter portraying Gemma Teller in the show. Katey Sagal and Kurt Sutter’s relationship history Katey Sagal and her husband first met one another through a mutual friend. Recalling their initial encounter in a 2009 E! News interview, the actress noted, “He called me like a couple months later and asked me to coffee, and we went and kind of never left each other after that.” After an undisclosed dating period, the couple tied the knot in October 2004 in a private ceremony in their Los Angeles home. They then welcomed their one and only child, Esmé Louise, via surrogacy in January 2007. Sagal and Sutter have since made several public appearances together, including the red carpet event for the premiere of the Sons of Anarchy spin-off, Mayans MC. Additionally, the two run a joint podcast, PIE, and have successfully completed almost 21 years of marriage.

What is Kurt Sutter’s job?

Katey Sagal’s husband is a screenwriter, director, producer, and actor.
